mapper.select: SELECT id, rno, review.rpno rpno, rtitle, rbody, rdate, rhit, rgrade, rx, ry FROM review, member WHERE rx= #{ax} AND review.mno = member.mno AND ry= #{ay} AND review.isshow='Y' ORDER BY rdate DESC
SELECT rno, rponame, rpsname, rpdir FROM review, rphoto WHERE rphoto.rpno = review.rpno AND rx = #{ax} AND ry = #{ay} AND review.isshow='Y'
SELECT * FROM areainfo, aphoto WHERE areainfo.apno = aphoto.apno AND ax= #{ax} AND ay= #{ay} AND isshow='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw} AND isshow = 'Y'
SELECT ano, aname, ax, ay FROM areainfo WHERE isshow='Y'
